meanings.definition: In a manner related to osteopathy.
meanings.sent1: She moved osteopathically, following the principles of osteopathy.
meanings.sent2: The patient was treated osteopathically, with a focus on holistic healing.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked osteopathically after its visit to the animal osteopath.
meanings.sent4: The car glided osteopathically along the road, smoothly and effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's movements were osteopathically graceful, flowing with balance and harmony.

meanings.sent1: The therapist provided an osteopathically effective treatment for the back pain.
meanings.sent2: Healing hands applied an osteopathically gentle touch to soothe the muscles.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared the dish with an osteopathically precise method, ensuring perfect flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist painted with an osteopathically delicate brushstroke, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic fixed the engine using an osteopathically careful approach, fixing the issue smoothly.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the practice of osteopathy.
meanings.sent1: The clinic offered osteopathically focused treatments for various ailments.
meanings.sent2: Her osteopathically trained hands provided relief to many patients.
meanings.sent3: The garden was designed with an osteopathically inspired layout, promoting relaxation.
meanings.sent4: His osteopathically aligned posture improved his overall well-being.
meanings.sent5: The team followed an osteopathically guided approach to healthcare, emphasizing natural healing.
